Verses: 1 theeruvin Baaram. Tharshees Kappalgale, Alarungal; Adhu Veedu Illaadhapadikkum, Adhil Varuvaar Illaadhapadikkum Paazhaakkappattadhu; Indha Seydhi Kiththeemdhesaththilirundhu Avargalukkuth Therivikkappadugiradhu.
2 theevukkudigale, Mavunamaayirungal; Seedhonin Varththagar Samuththiraththile Yaaththiraipanni Unnai Nirappinaargal.
3 seekor Nadhiyin Migundha Neerppaaichchalgalaal Vilaiyum Payirvagaigalum, Aatrangaraiyin Aruppum Adhin Varumaanamaayirundhadhu; Adhu Jaadhigalin Sandhaiyaayirundhadhu.

4 seedhone, Vetkappadu; Naan Inik Karppavedhanaippadugiradhum Illai; Perugiradhum Illai; Ilaignarai Valarkkiradhum Illai; Kannigaigalai Aadharikkiradhum Illai Endru Samuththirak Kottaiyaana Kadalthurai Sollugiradhu.
5 egipthin Seydhi Ketkappattadhinaal Noi Undaanadhupola Theeruvin Seydhi Ketkappaduvadhinaalum Noi Undaagum.
6 karaidhuraik Kudigale, Neengal Tharsheesmattum Purappattuppoi Alarungal.
7 poorvanaatkalmudhal Nilaipetrukalikoorndhirundha Ungal Pattanam Idhudhaanaa? Paradhesampoi Sanjarikkiradharku Aval Kaalgale Avalai Dhooramaaik Kondupom.
8 kreedam Tharippikkum Theerukku Virodhamaaga Idhai Yosiththuth Theermaaniththavar Yaar? Adhin Varththagar Prabukkalum, Adhin Viyaabaarigal Boomiyin Kanavaangalumaame.
9 sarva Singaaraththin Menmaiyaik Kulaikkavum Boomiyin Kanavaangal Yaavaraiyum Kanaeenappaduththavum, Senaigalin Karththare Idhai Yosiththuth Theermaaniththaar.
10 tharsheesin Kumaaraththiye, Nadhiyaippola Nee Un Dhesaththil Paaindhupo, Unakku Anaiyillai.
11 karththar Thamadhu Kaiyai Samuththiraththinmel Neetti, Raajyangalaik Kulungappanninaar; Kaanaanin Arangalai Azhikka Avar Adharku Virodhamaaik Kattalaikoduththu:
12 odungunda Kanniyaagiya Seedhon Kumaaraththiye, Inik Kalikoorndhukondiraai, Ezhundhu Kiththeemukkup Purappattuppo, Angum Unakku Ilaippaarudhal Illaiyendraar.

13 kaldheyarudaiya Dhesaththaip Paar; Andha Janam Munnirundhadhillai; Aseeriyan Vanaandharaththaarukkaaga Adhai Asthibaarappaduththinaan; Avargal Adhin Koburangalai Undaakki, Adhin Aramanaigalaik Kattinaargal; Avar Adhai Azhivukkendru Niyamiththaar.
14 tharshees Kappalgale, Alarungal; Ungal Aran Paazhaakkappattadhu.
15 akkaalaththile Theeru, Oru Raajaavudaiya Naatkalinpadi, Ezhubadhu Varusham Marakkappattirukkum; Ezhubadhu Varushangalin Mudivile Theeruvukku Sambavippadhu Vesiyin Paadalukku Samaanamaayirukkum.
16 marakkappatta Vesiye, Nee Veenaiyai Eduththu Nagaraththai Sutriththiri; Nee Ninaikkappadumpadi Adhai Inidhaaga Vaasiththu Bala Paattugalaip Paadu.
17 ezhubadhu Varushangalin Mudivile Karththar Vandhu Theeruvai Sandhippaar; Appozhudhu Adhu Than Panaiyaththukku Thirumbivandhu, Boomiyilulla Sagala Raajyangalodum Vesiththanam Pannum.

18 adhin Viyaabaaramum, Adhin Panaiyamum Karththarukkup Parisuththamaakkappadum; Adhu Pokkishamaai Serkkappaduvadhum Illai; Pootti Vaikkappaduvadhum Illai;karththarudaiya Samugaththil Vaasamaayirukkiravargal Thirupthiyaaga Saappidavum Nalla Vasthirangalaith Tharikkavum Adhin Viyaabaaram Avargalai Serum.
